definition: permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)

sentences.english: Torque on a Magnetic Dipole in a Constant Field.
sentences.chinese: 穩恆磁場中磁偶極子的轉矩。

sentences.english: Hall magnetometer can be used to measure stable magnetic field and the magnetic field changing with time.
sentences.chinese: 霍耳磁強計可測量穩恆磁場及隨時間變化磁場。

sentences.english: Unknown signals are always be treated as outputs of stationary information sources which are easy to be dealt with.
sentences.chinese: 對於未知信號而言，一般將其視爲穩恆信源的輸出。
